name: PARTNERSHIP FOR CONSERVATION
sampleDescriptions: Conservation easement tax deduction; S.2436, H.R. 4459, Charitable Conservation Easement Program Integrity Act of 2017; H.R. 3220, Preserving Taxpayers' Rights Act.
